title: Project-Based Learning for Traffic Safety Utilizing Gamification

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Large-scale project-based learning environment utilizing gamification and reward systems via smartphones

learning_goals: Learners can identify risk factors with over 80% accuracy by applying mathematical analysis techniques for traffic accident prevention.
Learners can improve their ability to make safe decisions in real-world road environments by three or more levels through in-game mission resolution.
Learners can develop and execute traffic safety campaign plans through team-based projects.

resources: Digital Badge Solution for Reward System Management
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
